WRITING.TITLE: Why i love Just Cause 3 - cant do that in GTA V

WRITING.TEXT:
It works almost perfect on my PC, get a Nvidia GTX970 and a decent i5 or i7 with 8 or 16GB RAM and a SSD.
I played 77 hours and it only crashed maybe two times, cant complain about stability.
I noticed with the new mech tank i also get some small framerate issues when i go full rampage with it. I think the physics calculations slow down the game when you move too many objects at once.
Works well on PC: https://www.reddit.com/r/JustCause/comments/3wonnp/massive_train_wreck_how_is_the_game_still_running/
"I dont want airbags and ABS in my car, it just makes it more expensive" - skinflint friend talking about new cars.
